messages.subject: tRe. The truth can be subjective
messages.msgSnippet: My parents never did the tooth fairy or the Easter Bunny - but they did do the Santa thing.  I did get my tooth exchanged for a few *pence* but I always knew
messages.messageBody:
My parents never did the tooth fairy or the Easter Bunny - but they
did do the Santa thing. I did get my tooth exchanged for a few
*pence* but I always knew it was my parents.

The same with my children. we only did the Santa thing. My kids knew
Santa only came to those who believd in him - but they also knew that
Parents bought for those who didnt believe .......

Believing made Christmas much more majical -

Marianne - Who after 27yrs in New Zealand still hasn't got used to
Christmas in Summer.
